729445f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - York Avenue
729445f-a.text:
Richmond Terrace, east from (No. 530)and including
York Avenue.
October 19,1930
P. L. Sperr
729445f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & York Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729455f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Jersey Street
729455f-a.text:
Richmond Terrace, east from (No. 472) a point east of Jersey Street.
June 11, 1938.
P.L. Sperr
729455f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Jersey Street, Staten Island, NY

729471f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - York Avenue
729471f-a.text:
526-530 Richmond Terrace, adjoining the S.W. corner of York Avenue. The house belonged to Mrs. Vredenburgh in 1874; to G. W. Vreuenarg in 1898; to G. W. Van Vresenburg in 1907, and to Wm. T. Van Vreuenburg in 1917. Dates refer to maps on which
the owners' names appear.
July 7, 1932
P. L. Sperr
729471f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & York Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729472f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - York Avenue
729472f-a.text:
530 Richmond Terrace, west of the S.W. corner of York Avenue. Che house was owned by Mrs. Vredenburgh in 1874; by W. T. Vresenburg in 1898; and by W. T. Van Vredenburg from 1907 to 1917. Dates refer to maps on which the owners' names
appear.
July 7, 1932
P. L. Sperr
729472f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & York Avenue, Staten Island, NY
